Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Enables any city having a population of one million or more to impose and collect taxes on vacant ground floor commercial premises
Summary: Enables any city having a population of one million or more to impose and collect taxes on vacant ground floor commercial premises.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to enabling any city having a population of one million or more to impose and collect taxes on vacant ground floor commercial premises
